reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 422/02: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2003 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — TIME LIMITS FOR 2003 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 422/02: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2003 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to time limits under sections 308, 310, 311, 314 and 362 of the Act for 2003. O. Reg. 422/02, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. This Regulation applies with respect to time limits under sections 308, 310, 311, 314 and 362 of the Act for 2003. O. Reg. 422/02, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The time limits under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to May 30, 2003. O. Reg. 422/02, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The time limits under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to May 30, 2003. O. Reg. 422/02, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Despite section 2, the time for passing a by-law under subsection 308 (4) of the Act for 2003 is extended to September 30, 2003 for the Municipality of Charlton and Dack, the Township of The Archipelago, the Municipality of Greenstone, the Township of Manitouwadge, the Town of Smith Falls and the City of Thunder Bay. O. Reg. 365/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 3. Despite section 2, the time for passing a by-law under subsection 308 (4) of the Act for 2003 is extended to September 30, 2003 for the Municipality of Charlton and Dack, the Township of The Archipelago, the Municipality of Greenstone, the Township of Manitouwadge, the Town of Smith Falls and the City of Thunder Bay. O. Reg. 365/03, s. 1.
